A B C D G I J M N O P R S T U

A

Action - interface javax.activity.coordination.Action.
An Action is an entity that is registered, via an ActivityCoordinator, with an interest in one or more SignalSets.
ActionErrorException - exception javax.activity.ActionErrorException.
This exception is thrown by the Action during signal processing if it encounters an error it cannot handle.
ActionErrorException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.ActionErrorException
Default constructor for the exception.
ActionErrorException(String) - Constructor for class javax.activity.ActionErrorException
Constructs an instance of the exception with the specified errorMsg.
ActionNotFoundException - exception javax.activity.ActionNotFoundException.
This exception is thrown by the Activity service when an attempt is made to remove the association between an Action and any SignalSets registered with the Activity if that Action instance is not recognized by the Activity service.
ActionNotFoundException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.ActionNotFoundException
Default constructor for the exception.
ActivityCompletedException - exception javax.activity.ActivityCompletedException.
This system exception may be thrown on any method for which Activity context is accessed and indicates that ongoing work within the Activity is not possible.
ActivityCompletedException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.ActivityCompletedException
Default constructor for the exception.
ActivityCompletedException(String) - Constructor for class javax.activity.ActivityCompletedException
Constructs an instance of the exception with the specified errorMsg.
ActivityCoordinator - interface javax.activity.ActivityCoordinator.
The ActivityCoordinator is responsible for broadcasting signals to registered Actions.
activityImported() - Method in interface javax.activity.coordination.ServiceManager
Indicates that an Activity of the type specific to the target ServiceManager has been received from another process and is active on the current thread.
ActivityInformation - class javax.activity.ActivityInformation.
The ActivityInformation class is provided by the Activity service to assist an Action that has registered interest with a system SignalSet to extract the information from Signals produced by that SignalSet.
ActivityInformation(GlobalId, int) - Constructor for class javax.activity.ActivityInformation
Constructs an ActivityInformation object, describing the Activity, from the GlobalId and CompletionStatus.
ActivityInformation(GlobalId, int, Outcome) - Constructor for class javax.activity.ActivityInformation
Constructs an ActivityInformation object, describing the Activity, from the GlobalId, CompletionStatus and final Outcome.
ActivityManager - interface javax.activity.ActivityManager.
The ActivityManager interface extends the UserActivity interface by offering methods to manipulate the Activity context.
ActivityNotProcessedException - exception javax.activity.ActivityNotProcessedException.
This exception is raised when it is not possible to complete the processing of signals from a completion or broadcast signal set.
ActivityNotProcessedException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.ActivityNotProcessedException
Default constructor for the exception.
ActivityNotProcessedException(String) - Constructor for class javax.activity.ActivityNotProcessedException
Constructs an instance of the exception with the specified errorMsg.
ActivityPendingException - exception javax.activity.ActivityPendingException.
This exception is thrown by the Activity service if an attempt is made to complete an Activity that has asynchronous work outstanding.
ActivityPendingException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.ActivityPendingException
Default constructor for the exception.
ActivityRequiredException - exception javax.activity.ActivityRequiredException.
This system exception is thrown by a container if Activity context is not received on a method for which Activity context is mandatory.
ActivityRequiredException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.ActivityRequiredException
Default constructor for the exception.
ActivityToken - interface javax.activity.ActivityToken.
An ActivityToken is used to manipulate hierarchies of Activity and transaction contexts via the suspend() and resume(ActivityToken) operations of the ActivityManager interface.
addAction(Action, String, int) - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityCoordinator
Establishes an interest relationship between the specified Action and SignalSet for the Activity represented by the target ActivityCoordinator.
addGlobalAction(Action, int) - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityCoordinator
Establishes an interest relationship between the specified Action and all SignalSets used by the Activity represented by the target ActivityCoordinator.

B

begin(int) - Method in interface javax.activity.UserActivity
Create a new Activity and associate it with the current thread.
broadcast(String) - Method in interface javax.activity.UserActivity
Causes the SignalSet specified by signalSetName to start producing signals for all registered Actions.

C

complete() - Method in interface javax.activity.UserActivity
Causes the active Activity context to be completed with its current CompletionStatus.
completed() - Method in interface javax.activity.propertygroup.PropertyGroup
Called by the Activity service as part of its completion processing to give the PropertyGroup the opportunity to perform any necessary clean-up work.
completeWithStatus(int) - Method in interface javax.activity.UserActivity
Causes the active Activity context to complete with the specified CompletionStatus.
CompletionStatus - interface javax.activity.CompletionStatus.
When an Activity completes, it does so in one of two states, either success or failure.
CompletionStatusFail - Static variable in interface javax.activity.CompletionStatus
The Activity has not successfully completed its work, either as a result of application failure or simply due to processing that is not yet complete, and should be driven accordingly during completion.
CompletionStatusFailOnly - Static variable in interface javax.activity.CompletionStatus
The Activity has not successfully completed its work, as a result of a system or application failure, and should be driven accordingly during completion.
CompletionStatusSuccess - Static variable in interface javax.activity.CompletionStatus
The Activity has successfully performed its work and can complete accordingly.
ContextPendingException - exception javax.activity.ContextPendingException.
This exception is thrown by the Activity service if an attempt is made to complete an Activity that has child contexts outstanding, if the CompletionStatus is CompletionStatusSuccess.
ContextPendingException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.ContextPendingException
Default constructor for the exception.
CoordinationInformation - class javax.activity.CoordinationInformation.
A CoordinationInformation object is returned from the SignalSet's setResponse method.
CoordinationInformation(boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class javax.activity.CoordinationInformation
Constructs a CoordinationInformation object to indicate to the calling ActivityCoordinator how to proceed with signaling.
create(PropertyGroup, GlobalId) - Method in interface javax.activity.propertygroup.PropertyGroupManager
Creates a new instance of a PropertyGroup specialization.

D

destroy() - Method in interface javax.activity.coordination.SignalSet
Called on the target object, by the Activity service, when the target object is no longer required and indicates to the object that it should perform any necessary clean-up.
destroy() - Method in interface javax.activity.coordination.Action
Called on the target object, by the Activity service, when the target object is no longer required and indicates to the object that it should perform any necessary clean-up.

getCompletionStatus() - Method in interface javax.activity.coordination.SignalSet

Returns a java.io.Serializable that contains context data specific to the implementation of the PropertyGroupManager.

Returns the name of the context group to which all the ServiceManager's activities belong.
getCoordinator() - Method in interface javax.activity.UserActivity
Returns the ActivityCoordinator of the active Activity, or null if there is no Activity associated with the calling thread.

getName() - Method in interface javax.activity.UserActivity

getNumberRegisteredActions(String) - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityCoordinator
Returns the number of Actions, including global Actions, registered with the target ActivityCoordinator with an interest in the specified SignalSet.
getOutcome() - Method in interface javax.activity.coordination.SignalSet
Returns the final Outcome of the SignalSet.
getParent() - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityCoordinator
Returns the parent ActivityCoordinator or null if the target ActivityCoordinator represents a top-level Activity.
getParentCoordinator() - Method in interface javax.activity.UserActivity
Returns the ActivityCoordinator of the parent of the active Activity, or null if the active Activity is a top-level Activity.
getParentStatus() - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityCoordinator
Returns the Status of the Activity represented by the target ActivityCoordinator's parent.
getProperties() - Method in interface javax.activity.propertygroup.PropertyGroupManager
Returns a Properties object that describes meta-properties for the behaviour of the PropertyGroupManager.
getPropertyGroup(String) - Method in interface javax.activity.UserActivity
Returns the instance of the type of PropertyGroup, identified by name, scoped to the active Activity.

Returns a String that identifies the PropertyGroup name.

Retreives the failing propertyGroupName.
getPropertyGroupName() - Method in interface javax.activity.propertygroup.PropertyGroup
Returns the name of the target PropertyGroup.
getPropertyGroupNames() - Method in interface javax.activity.coordination.ServiceManager
Returns the array of PropertyGroup names that are used by the HLS.
getService() - Method in interface javax.activity.UserActivity
Returns the registered ServiceManager for this UserActivity instance.
getServiceInformation() - Method in interface javax.activity.coordination.ServiceManager
Returns a reference to the ServiceInformation object that encapsulates all the information about the HLS that needs to be propagated as part of Activity service context in the type_specific_data, for example the ContextGroup name.
getServiceName() - Method in class javax.activity.ServiceInformation
Returns a String that identifies the high-level-service (HLS) name.
getServiceSpecificDataAny() - Method in class javax.activity.ServiceInformation
Returns a CORBA Any that contains information specific to the particular HLS ServiceManager.
getServiceSpecificDataValue() - Method in class javax.activity.ServiceInformation
Returns a java.io.Serializable that contains information specific to the particular HLS ServiceManager.

Returns the default timeout value.
GlobalId - interface javax.activity.GlobalId.
A GlobalId uniquely identifies an Activity across the namespace.

I

InvalidActivityException - exception javax.activity.InvalidActivityException.
This system exception may be thrown on any method for which Activity context is accessed and indicates that the attempted invocation or the Activity context associated with the attempted invocation is incompatible with the Activity's current state.
InvalidActivityException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.InvalidActivityException
Default constructor for the exception.
InvalidActivityException(String) - Constructor for class javax.activity.InvalidActivityException
Constructs an instance of the exception with the specified errorMsg.
InvalidParentContextException - exception javax.activity.InvalidParentContextException.
This exception is thrown by the Activity service when an attempt is made to resume an Activity into a different context to that from which it was suspended.
InvalidParentContextException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.InvalidParentContextException
Default constructor for the exception.
InvalidStateException - exception javax.activity.InvalidStateException.
This exception is thrown by the Activity service when an attempt is made to begin an Activity as a child of a context whose CompletionStatus is CompletionStatusFailOnly or to change the state of an Activity from CompletionStatusFailOnly.
InvalidStateException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.InvalidStateException
Default constructor for the exception.
isActionInterested() - Method in class javax.activity.CoordinationInformation
Returns a boolean to indicate to the calling ActivityCoordinator whether a particular Action should receive any further signals during the lifetime of the current Activity.
isSameActivity(ActivityCoordinator) - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityCoordinator
Returns true if the specified coord represents the same Activity as the target ActivityCoordinator.

M

marshalRequest(PropertyGroup) - Method in interface javax.activity.propertygroup.PropertyGroupManager
Called by the Activity service when it marshals an Activity context for an outbound request.
marshalResponse(PropertyGroup) - Method in interface javax.activity.propertygroup.PropertyGroupManager
Called by the Activity service when it marshals an Activity context for an outbound response.

N

NoActivityException - exception javax.activity.NoActivityException.
This exception is thrown by the Activity service when UserActivity operations that require an active Activity are called outside the scope of an Activity.
NoActivityException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.NoActivityException
Default constructor for the exception.
NoImplementException - exception javax.activity.NoImplementException.
This exception is thrown by the Activity service if an Activity service operation is attempted in an execution environment for which that operation is not supported.
NoImplementException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.NoImplementException
Default constructor for the exception.
NotOriginatorException - exception javax.activity.NotOriginatorException.
This exception is thrown by the Activity service if an attempt is made by an application to complete an Activity in an execution environment different to that in which the Activity was created.
NotOriginatorException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.NotOriginatorException
Default constructor for the exception.

O

Outcome - class javax.activity.Outcome.
An Outcome is produced by, and given meaning by, a SignalSet when it has finished producing signals.

Constructor used by the Activity service or HLS to create an Outcome object.

Constructor used by the Activity service to create an Outcome object.
Outcome(String, Serializable) - Constructor for class javax.activity.Outcome
Constructor used by a HLS to create an Outcome object.

P

print() - Method in interface javax.activity.GlobalId
Returns a printable String that identifies the Activity.
processSignal(Signal) - Method in interface javax.activity.coordination.Action
Invoked on the target object, by the Activity service, during signal processing.
PropertyGroup - interface javax.activity.propertygroup.PropertyGroup.
A PropertyGroup is used to provide distributed context, scoped to an Activity, that may be set by an application or a high-level service (HLS) built on top of the Activity service.
PropertyGroupContext - class javax.activity.PropertyGroupContext.
The PropertyGroupContext utility object is provided by the Activity service to assist a PropertyGroupManager read and write org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity context data during marshalling and unmarshalling of the org.omg.CosActivity.ActivityContext that incorporates it.
PropertyGroupContext(String, Any) - Constructor for class javax.activity.PropertyGroupContext
Constructor used by the Activity service or a PropertyGroupManager to hold the contents of the org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity structure.
PropertyGroupContext(String, MarshalledObject) - Constructor for class javax.activity.PropertyGroupContext
Constructor used by the Activity service to hold the contents of a org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity structure.
PropertyGroupContext(String, Serializable) - Constructor for class javax.activity.PropertyGroupContext
Constructor used by a PropertyGroupManager to hold the contents of the org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity structure.
PropertyGroupManager - interface javax.activity.propertygroup.PropertyGroupManager.
A PropertyGroupManager is an entity that is be provided, as part of a High Level Service (HLS) ServiceManager implementation, together with any PropertyGroups used by the HLS.
PropertyGroupUnknownException - exception javax.activity.PropertyGroupUnknownException.
This exception is thrown by the Activity service if an attempt is made to retrieve, or otherwise reference, a PropertyGroup with a name for which no PropertyGroupManager has been registered.
PropertyGroupUnknownException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.PropertyGroupUnknownException
Default constructor for the exception.
PropertyGroupUnknownException(String) - Constructor for class javax.activity.PropertyGroupUnknownException
Constructs a PropertyGroupUnknownException with the specified propertyGroupName.

R

recoverActions(GlobalId, String) - Method in interface javax.activity.coordination.ServiceManager
Driven after a failure in order to retrieve any recovered Actions that were involved in the Activity identified by globalId prior to the failure.
recoverSignalSets(GlobalId) - Method in interface javax.activity.coordination.ServiceManager
Driven after a failure in order to retrieve any recovered SignalSets that were involved in the Activity identified by globalId prior to the failure.
recreate(GlobalId) - Method in interface javax.activity.UserActivity
Recreates the Activity with the specified globalId after a failure.
registerService(ServiceManager) - Method in interface javax.activity.UserActivity
Registers a ServiceManager for the type of high-level service (HLS) whose activities are to be demarcated through the target UserActivity instance.
removeAction(Action, String) - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityCoordinator
Removes the interest relationship between the specified Action and SignalSet for the Activity represented by the target ActivityCoordinator.
removeGlobalAction(Action) - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityCoordinator
Removes the interest relationship between the specified Action and all SignalSets for the Activity represented by the target ActivityCoordinator.
resume(ActivityToken) - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityManager
Resumes the association of the Activity, and any nested Activity, represented by the ActivityToken with the calling thread of execution.
resumeAll(ActivityToken) - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityManager
Resumes the association of all transaction and Activity contexts represented by the ActivityToken with the calling thread of execution.
resumed() - Method in interface javax.activity.propertygroup.PropertyGroup
Called to inform the PropertyGroup that the Activity it represents has been resumed.
resumeGroup(ActivityToken) - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityManager
Resumes the association of the Activity hierarchy represented by the ActivityToken with the calling thread of execution.

S

ServiceAlreadyRegisteredException - exception javax.activity.ServiceAlreadyRegisteredException.
This exception is thrown by the Activity service if an attempt is made to register a different ServiceManager to the one already registered with the target UserActivity.
ServiceAlreadyRegisteredException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.ServiceAlreadyRegisteredException
Default constructor for the exception.
ServiceInformation - class javax.activity.ServiceInformation.
An instance of a ServiceInformation object is used by each ServiceManager to identify the name of the high-level service (HLS) and the context group to which a particular Activity belongs.
ServiceInformation(String, String, Any) - Constructor for class javax.activity.ServiceInformation
Constructor used by the Activity service or HLS to create a ServiceInformation object to hold the contents of a org.omg.CosActivity.ActivityIdentity.activity_specific_data.
ServiceInformation(String, String, MarshalledObject) - Constructor for class javax.activity.ServiceInformation
Constructor used by the Activity service to create a ServiceInformation object to hold the contents of a org.omg.CosActivity.ActivityIdentity.activity_specific_data.
ServiceInformation(String, String, Serializable) - Constructor for class javax.activity.ServiceInformation
Constructor used by a HLS to create a ServiceInformation object to hold the contents of a org.omg.CosActivity.ActivityIdentity.activity_specific_data.
ServiceManager - interface javax.activity.coordination.ServiceManager.
A ServiceManager is an entity that is provided by a high-level service (HLS) that uses the Activity service; it is a factory for the HLS's objects and also specifies how the HLS's Activities should be managed.
ServiceNotRegisteredException - exception javax.activity.ServiceNotRegisteredException.
This exception is thrown by the Activity service if an attempt is made to operate on the active Activity, through a UserActivity or ActivityManager instance before a ServiceManager has been registered for that instance.
ServiceNotRegisteredException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.ServiceNotRegisteredException
Default constructor for the exception.
setActivityCoordinator(ActivityCoordinator) - Method in interface javax.activity.coordination.SignalSet
Called by the Activity service to pass a reference to the ActivityCoordinator to the target SignalSet.
setCompletionSignalSetName(String) - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityCoordinator
Sets the name of the SignalSet that should be used for the distribution of completion signals when the current Activity completes.
setCompletionStatus(int) - Method in interface javax.activity.UserActivity
Sets the CompletionStatus of the active Activity.
setCompletionStatus(int, int) - Method in interface javax.activity.coordination.SignalSet
Called by the Activity service to set both the CompletionStatus and Status before any signals are requested.
setPersistent() - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityCoordinator
Indicates to the Activity service that the HLS is about to persist its recoverable state.
setResponse(Outcome) - Method in interface javax.activity.coordination.SignalSet
Called by an ActivityCoordinator to notify the target SignalSet of the Outcome returned by an Action in response to a Signal produced by the SignalSet.
setServiceInformation(ServiceInformation) - Method in interface javax.activity.coordination.ServiceManager
Passes to a ServiceManager instance the ServiceInformation object encoded in the type_specific_data of a received context.
setSignal(Signal) - Method in interface javax.activity.coordination.SignalSet
Sets the Signal to be sent to the Actions registered for this SignalSet.
setTimeout(int) - Method in interface javax.activity.UserActivity
Sets the default timeout, in seconds, after which an Activity may be automatically completed by the Activity service.
Signal - class javax.activity.Signal.
Signals are events that are broadcast to interested parties as part of a coordinated SignalSet.
Signal(String, String, Any) - Constructor for class javax.activity.Signal
Constructor used by the Activity service or HLS to create a Signal object.
Signal(String, String, MarshalledObject) - Constructor for class javax.activity.Signal
Constructor used by the Activity service to create a Signal object.
Signal(String, String, Serializable) - Constructor for class javax.activity.Signal
Constructor used by a HLS to create a Signal object.
SignalSet - interface javax.activity.coordination.SignalSet.
A SignalSet is an entity that is provided by a high-level service (HLS) built on top of the Activity service that produces Signals and understands the responses to those Signals.
SignalSetActiveException - exception javax.activity.SignalSetActiveException.
This exception is thrown by the SignalSet if an attempt is made to obtain its final Outcome after the SignalSet has started to produce signals and before it has finished producing them.
SignalSetActiveException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.SignalSetActiveException
Default constructor for the exception.
SignalSetInactiveException - exception javax.activity.SignalSetInactiveException.
This exception is thrown by the SignalSet if an attempt is made to use the SignalSet without having first called getSignal or setSignal.
SignalSetInactiveException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.SignalSetInactiveException
Default constructor for the exception.
SignalSetUnknownException - exception javax.activity.SignalSetUnknownException.
This exception is thrown by the Activity service if it is instructed to use a SignalSet that has not previously been registered.
SignalSetUnknownException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.SignalSetUnknownException
Default constructor for the exception.
Status - interface javax.activity.Status.
During the existence of an Activity its Status will progress from StatusActive through StatusCompleting to StatusCompleted.
StatusActive - Static variable in interface javax.activity.Status
There is an active Activity associated with the calling thread
StatusCompleted - Static variable in interface javax.activity.Status
The Activity associated with the calling thread has completed
StatusCompleting - Static variable in interface javax.activity.Status
The Activity associated with the calling thread is completing
StatusError - Static variable in interface javax.activity.Status
The Activity service cannot contact the application's signal set to retrieve signals
StatusNoActivity - Static variable in interface javax.activity.Status
There is no Activity associated with the calling thread
StatusUnknown - Static variable in interface javax.activity.Status
The Activity service is unable to determine the status of the Activity associated with the calling thread.
suspend() - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityManager
Suspends the association of the current Activity from the calling thread of execution along with any child Activities nested within that Activity.
suspendAll() - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityManager
Suspends the association of all transaction and Activity contexts from the calling thread of execution.
suspended() - Method in interface javax.activity.propertygroup.PropertyGroup
Called to inform the PropertyGroup that the Activity it represents has been suspended.
suspendGroup() - Method in interface javax.activity.ActivityManager
Suspends the association of the current Activity from the calling thread of execution along with any Activities belonging to the same ContextGroup.
SystemException - exception javax.activity.SystemException.
This exception is thrown by the Activity service if an unexpected condition occurs.
SystemException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.SystemException
Default constructor for the exception.
SystemException(Exception) - Constructor for class javax.activity.SystemException
Constructs an instance of the exception with the specified exception.
SystemException(String) - Constructor for class javax.activity.SystemException
Constructs an instance of the exception with the specified errorMsg.
SystemException(String, Exception) - Constructor for class javax.activity.SystemException
Constructs an instance of the exception with the specified exception and errorMsg.

T

TimeoutRangeException - exception javax.activity.TimeoutRangeException.
This exception is thrown by the Activity service if an Activity timeout value is specified that is either: less than -1 or outside an administratively defined range
TimeoutRangeException() - Constructor for class javax.activity.TimeoutRangeException
Default constructor for the exception.
toBytes() - Method in interface javax.activity.GlobalId
Returns a byte array representation of the GlobalId.

U

unmarshalRequest(PropertyGroupContext, PropertyGroup, PropertyGroup, GlobalId) - Method in interface javax.activity.propertygroup.PropertyGroupManager
Creates a new instance of a PropertyGroup specialization from an inbound PropertyGroupContext.
unmarshalResponse(PropertyGroupContext, PropertyGroup) - Method in interface javax.activity.propertygroup.PropertyGroupManager
Called by the Activity service when it unmarshals an Activity context on an inbound response.
useNextSignal() - Method in class javax.activity.CoordinationInformation
Returns a boolean to indicates to the calling ActivityCoordinator whether it should request the next Signal from the SignalSet even if the current Signal has not yet been distributed to all registered Actions.
UserActivity - interface javax.activity.UserActivity.
The UserActivity interface defines the methods offered to a high-level service (HLS) constructed on top of the Activity service framework.
